description:
With the finals only 3 days away, the four other members of the Shuffle Alliance wait for Domon to finish his training so they can leave for Neo Hong Kong, where the finals will take place.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der Finalkampf steht an! Nur noch 3 Tage
Kesshou Semaru! Time Limit Mikka Mae
La phase finale approche ! Trois jours pour y parvenir
The Final Battle Approaches! Only 3 Days Away
決勝迫る! タイムリミット3日前
